hw13
Class MyImage

java.lang.Object
  hw13.MyImage

public class MyImage
extends java.lang.Object

Custom Image class that provides reading/writing gray-scale images.

          The BufferedImage object representing the bitmap

private  double WEIGHT_CONSTANT
          The exponential constant in the weight calculation expression -k*Color_Diff(i, j) w(i, j) = Max_Weight * e

colorDiff

private static int colorDiff(int rgba1,
                             int rgba2)
REturns a measure of color difference between two rgba values. Diff = |red1-red2| + |green1-green2| + |blue1-blue2|

Parameters:
rgba1 - The first color to be compared
rgba2 - The second color to be compared
Returns:
The color difference value.

createPixelDiffImage

public static MyImage createPixelDiffImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                           Graph2D graph)
On an offline image, draw pixel diff image. This image is used for debugging purposes only.

Parameters:
image - The image from which the pixel diff will be created
graph - The source of the pixel diff (Graph2D)
Returns:
The pixel diff image.

createBorderImage

public static MyImage createBorderImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                        Polygon poly)
On an offline image, draw the border polygon. During creating the pixel store, this image will be checked for testing the edges.

Parameters:
image - The image from which the border image will be created
poly - The polygon surrounding the image
Returns:
The border image.
